Other Information.Additional Info: The Ce-MOF-808 membrane exhibits strong adsorption and sieving effects on lithium polysulfides, inhibiting their shuttle effect while allowing Li-ion transport.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Fast and uniform diffusion facilitated by O-containing groups

Other Information.Additional Info: The Ce-MOF-808 membrane promotes rapid and homogeneous Li-ion diffusion, suppressing lithium dendrite growth.

Sieving Mechanism: Selective sieving of lithium polysulfides while allowing Li-ion transport

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, adsorption tests, CV measurements, EIS, symmetric cell cycling
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Initial discharge capacity: 954.7 mAh gâˆ’1 at 1 C, capacity retention: 87% over 500 cycles, low decay rate: 0.025% per cycle

Other Information.Additional Info: The Ce-MOF-808 membrane also catalyzes the conversion of lithium polysulfides, enhancing battery performance under high sulfur loading and lean electrolyte conditions.
